title: T206 American Beauty Steamer Flanagan SOLD

posts.post_title: T206 American Beauty Steamer Flanagan SOLD
posts.post_content:
Interested in trading this for two lower grade cards - a lower grade but presentable American Beauty (no paper loss) and a lower grade but presentable (no paper loss) Cycle back or Tolstoi.   Let me know what you have to horse swap.  

Since I've been asked about just selling,  selling price would be SOLD

bumped to add requested selling price,  but would still rather trade or just hold it if not.
